website_summaries.verdict: Take Mexican night to the next level with these 12 affordable, high quality margarita glasses.
pros: We found the glass had a durable and high quality feel
The rim of the glass has a lovely rounded edge, which makes salting the rim simple
The packaging was secure and can serve as storage for the glasses when they are not in use
There is a classic margarita design that will fit in with any table setting
These glasses are dishwasher safe as well
cons: Glasses run slightly smaller, holding, about 9oz

customer_reviews.title: A must have for margarita lovers!
customer_reviews.text: These are great margarita glasses and really make the mood festive. I am a firm believer in drinking beverages in the correct glasses and these make taco Tuesday nights with friends a fun experience. I have washed them on the top rack of my dishwasher without an issue, not sure if that is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ready for Cinco de Mayo!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a party I threw and they were a hit! They came packaged pretty well with individual slots for each glass in a sturdy but lightweight box. There were no chips or cracks on any of the glasses. I will say that there is a seam on some of the bases but it's not extremely noticeable. I believe they are dishwasher safe but I chose to hand wash them and dry them with a microfiber towel.
customer_reviews.author: Evie T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Everyday Glassware
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are versatile enough to use everyday in a variety of situations such a many different types of cocktails and desserts. They are very dirty right out of the box but a wash in soap and water and they really sparkle. These are sturdy bar quality glasses. If you are looking for fine stemware, these are not for you. I know mine will see a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeMan47

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking glasses and they are big great for margaritas and perfect for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: 10 0f them arrived safely
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of the 12 glasses were chipped upon arrival. Were packed in egg crate partitions, with an air cell all around. But no protection top to bottom.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID D.

customer_reviews.title: Margarita glasses to own!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our Mexican themed taco party! They were a great deal and cheaper than using plastic! Came in sturdy box that perfect for storing them!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Keating

customer_reviews.title: Should’ve been packaged with more care
customer_reviews.text: I like how the cups are nice and sturdy on the other hand, d t like how one was broken.. there should be a way better system to package these, should’ve at least had the bubble wrap around or something so none of the glasses would be broken by the time it’s been received.. have to keep in mind of how people handle the packaging.. it said fragile.. but I’m super small lettering.. should make more noticeable!
customer_reviews.author: vanessa jauregui

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I opted to buy these instead of plastic for a fiesta themed party. They exceeded my expectations! The glass seems sturdy and heavy enough that they should not shatter easily. The shapes is very nice- more of a classy margarita look. They are large, too, and could be used for other purposes, such a a mashed potato or grits bar, desserts, etc. Pleased!
customer_reviews.author: WinWigWon

customer_reviews.title: perfect size. Cheap and so much better than plastic
customer_reviews.text: Did their job, perfect size. Cheap and so much better than plastic!
customer_reviews.author: meme

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: They were inexpensive and I was looking for them for a party
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Nice size & makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packed and no damage. Great price compared to other vendors. Not jumbo size, but perfect for entertaining size. Would make a great gift. You don’t think about needing them until you do.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki OKeefe

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold much liquid in the glass. Had to order a different glass to hold a reasonable amount.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H.

customer_reviews.title: So worth to buy!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently fall in love with making margarita myself. These glasses are perfect for my drinks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Every single glass had an imperfection on the lip. This dip or bump was pretty noticeable and I returned the product. It seems like their mold had an issue since it was consistent across all glasses
customer_reviews.author: R Smith

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy and have held up to the dishwasher a few ...
customer_reviews.text: These glasses came in their own storage box so I can tuck them away if/when not in use. They are sturdy and have held up to the dishwasher a few times. For the price, this is the set to go with if you have large gatherings and don't want to use finer glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Party!
customer_reviews.text: We had an end-of-summer party and these were the perfect size. I had to order everything else about 3 weeks ahead of time (not knowing how much shipping times had changed). I think the glasses shipped the SAME day and arrive a couple of days later. Perfection!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly and were just want we wanted. I didn’t give 5 stars for sturdiness because they are a little this but margarita glasses generally aren’t heavy. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Woodson

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Small & 2 were broken but overall fine for a girls night.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany H

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I used the glasses for a project for a group of ladies. They were perfect for the price. If you need a bunch of margarita glasses for a great price, then look no further. There were no major flaws in any of the glasses. They did need some brushing off or washing, but otherwise, they were great! (Oh, some arrived broken, but Amazon is great and always takes care of things.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking glasses for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was actually surprised for the price how durable nice they were. They’re perfect for margaritas and piña colada’s.
customer_reviews.author: TBF

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control. Order 12 if you only need 8 good ones
customer_reviews.text: 4 of the 12 glasses were misshapen. Very poor quality. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Rickey L. Lu

customer_reviews.title: Real glass and real nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses! REAL glass too! Which was perfect for my Mexican themed party. Definitely recommend getting these!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cab

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: These we're just what we needed--basic margarita glasses. I didn't want to spend a lot of money for glasses we would use only occasionally. The quality was good and so was the price.
customer_reviews.author: CrosswordKathy

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Would have liked them to be just a tad bigger but it's okay. It is nice looking and durable and great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Vijay

customer_reviews.title: Margarita Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I would’ve given this 5 stars but one of my glasses came damaged. Overall I am please with this purchase that I made for margaritas on cinco de mayo.
customer_reviews.author: Daijanique

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item a few years ago and never took the time to let a review. Definitively worth every single penny
customer_reviews.author: Elsa

customer_reviews.title: Just what the Doctor ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Great size for a party! Throw them in the dishwasher, and have some more fun!
customer_reviews.author: coffee aficionado

customer_reviews.title: Great for girls night
customer_reviews.text: Great for girls night! One glass was broke upon arrival, but not a huge issue for me as all the rest were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K.krew16

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are such a great deal! I got them for $26.69 with free shipping. They were all in one piece as were the Martini set by Libbey as well. They are a perfect size which is hard to find as they are usually way too big. Highly recommended! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Devine

customer_reviews.title: Good product but too small
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were packaged great and still using for storage. Only thing I don't like is the small size which was my fault for not checking
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses, one not useable
customer_reviews.text: Great size and value. One came with a big chip on the top and had to be thrown away. Wasn't worth the effort of returning as we did not really need 12.
customer_reviews.author: Jill K

customer_reviews.title: libby 12-piece margarita party set
customer_reviews.text: this product came in immediately after ordering via fed ex. the glasses were wrapped in bubble wrap and in a reusable box for storage when not in use. I would definitely recommend this set to anyone. also, the price can't be beat, and the glasses are perfect drink size--not too big or too small. GREAT JOB !!!
customer_reviews.author: karen w

customer_reviews.title: AND good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Okay but smaller than I expected. Got some at the Dollar Tree that were much bigger and much cheaper...AND good quality...
customer_reviews.author: L. Devlin

customer_reviews.title: These are a great buy. We took them to a casual rehearsal ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a great buy. We took them to a casual rehearsal dinner when we were asked to make Margaritas for everyone. We left them with the bride and groom as an extra wedding gift. The Bridge and I really like that they come with a storage case so you don't have to take up cabinet space storing them. I would buy them again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jacksonville FL Native

customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to the bar, good value so doesn't matter if it breaks
customer_reviews.author: BANDE

customer_reviews.title: Broken glass
customer_reviews.text: I like the glasses but packaging did not protect the glasses very well and I had one broken.
customer_reviews.author: MM123

customer_reviews.title: Defective glasses
customer_reviews.text: Okay glasses. Not top of the line quality. Two glasses came defective.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Affordable margarita glasses
customer_reviews.text: Good margarita glasses for Mexican party. They are sturdy thick glasses. Great price. You will not make a tantrum if some of your guests brake a glass.
customer_reviews.author: Lunacornea

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great for having guests. Persnally i like a bigger glass when drinking with one or two others but this is perfect for partys. I have the margaritaville mixer and one batch fills about 6 glasses. Ive hade them for 6 months with weekly use and not one has broken yet!
customer_reviews.author: Eric John Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great for large gatherings
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pack in their own storage box, durable, pretty, and I do get many compliments on the style and design. Perfect use for the occasional large neighborhood party.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Best party set for home
customer_reviews.text: Best party set for home. Very well built. Cost effective. Perfect size. Nice storage box (the original cardboard packaging is the storage box). For me, Amazon packing was excellent, and arrived in perfect condition. Used it. Love it. Recommend it. I also bought and used the Martini set. Equally good.
customer_reviews.author: SmilingBuddha

customer_reviews.title: Great Set! Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the purchase. I bought for a party so we wouldn't have to use paper cups. I figured at this price it couldn't hurt to try. I was a little worried about the size, because one reviewer commented that they preferred larger glasses. However I like the size. They are not the bucket size/share with friends size/like at some Mexican restaurants, but by no means would anyone think they were small or think they were insufficient. The storage box is very sturdy and with handles. I do keep my glasses stored in there. Helps free up cabinet space that way. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: angiev

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a gift. Great glasses just as pictured. Nice size and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Not fancy, does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about. Good solid margarita glasses. Well-packaged. Nothing fancy. Great price . Perfect for our Cinco de Mayo party.
customer_reviews.author: Cinco de Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Cinco de Mayo Bridal Shower
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy product for the price! Plus the glasses look like good quality, are dishwasher safe, and are just all arounda great buy when looking to buy Margarita Glasses in bulk. I was very pleased with this product and would buy Libbey-brand glassware again.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a margarita bar
customer_reviews.text: Perfect option for a margarita bar, best deal I found
customer_reviews.author: Louise Arndt

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Product
customer_reviews.text: I had looked around in the local stores for some affordable margarita glasses but didn't have much luck. I was hesitant to order glassware online but I have to say that I really am pleased with my purchase. The package arrived in perfect condition and right on time. The glasses are a nice size--not too big or too small--and I love that a storage box comes with them, too!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: It works for me. Party time.
customer_reviews.text: Relatively inexpensive glass and lots of it. It works for me.
customer_reviews.author: b-law

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good quality for the price. Still going strong a year later. Purchased these for a college student and made well.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved set
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a gift for my daughter, she loved the set.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Solano

customer_reviews.title: Margarita Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect margarita glasses at a great price. No margarita party would be complete without them. A huge success paired with the Margaritaville frozen concoction maker!
customer_reviews.author: gaway

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good set of glasses, especially for the price. Wish they were a bit larger, but they perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Via

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice. I got these for a Cinco De Mayo party. Everyone enjoyed the mararitas. If you like to entertain, you need to get these. The 9oz size means that people don't drink too much. The storage box is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KPS

customer_reviews.title: Broken product replaced
customer_reviews.text: The glasses arrived quickly but carelessly packaged and broken. I needed them for a party and reported it that day. I was pleased that they were replaced immediately and in time for the party(2nd day).
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses great box. I'm ordering more so I guess that sums it up.
customer_reviews.author: just some guy

customer_reviews.title: Great price but small glasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to paint. Came out great but smaller than my other margarita glasses and the stem is not as long.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Allan Bucar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome glasses for the price! Love the storage box that they come in!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glasses!
customer_reviews.text: They’re great for the price, only problem is they’re a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Margarita glasses
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! Not too delicate & a good sized drink!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other reviews posted here - the glasses are just right size and they come in a really sturdy cardboard box that is perfect for storing. They were a great hit at a party I held recently. All the ladies loved them. And they are super easy to rim with sugar for that extra touch.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Family

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glasses
customer_reviews.text: While these may be a bit on the small size, they are amazing for their price! I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: KrisB

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses though
customer_reviews.text: One glass was broken but my event was the next day so I had no time to deal with returns. Great glasses though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bargain for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We needed some margarita glasses for our bar and these were exactly what we were looking for. They are sturdy, nice, and come in a very handy storage box! Great value for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: DONALD C. IVEY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Glasses/Great Packaging
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great! Good quality, perfect size. They are very well packaged. I was happy to see that upon arrival, every single one was intact. I was very happy with this purchase and I would recommend these glasses to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tania180

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: 1 of the 12 glasses arrived broken, the rest were fine
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced & arrived in 3 days. What more could we ask for?!!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Ayn

customer_reviews.title: Love the product!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set and well priced as compared to glass sets found in other stores. Well packaged and I loved the storage box that it is mailed in.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Allen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Were shipped on time and were not broken upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be packaged better
customer_reviews.text: The glasses themselves are fine and very nice. I bought this item as a gift but they are just in a box with a lid that doesn't seal and only have a very thin piece of cardboard in between the glasses. The first time it was shipped a couple glasses were broken and I had to send for a replacement. The second shipment came mostly intact, there was a small chip in one of the glasses, but my friend said it wasn't worth sending back. I would recommend the manufacturer find a better way to pack them for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Baston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were just the right size of glasses I needed for a gift. My friend loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Jenjira	Higginbotham

customer_reviews.title: Margarita Party Set
customer_reviews.text: The shipment came with bubble wrap around the box of glasses and the box that the glasses came in doubles as storage after use. The quality of the glasses was great. I would buy Libbey glasses again.
customer_reviews.author: ssalerno

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My brother absolutely loves them! They were shipped in a super padded box and they are a great size not too big and not too small!
customer_reviews.author: EKleine

customer_reviews.title: Margarita Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love the glasses, they were exactly what I expected to get,they were packaged and shipped as to prevent breakage, Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: yea,, great product
customer_reviews.text: very good product,, have used them a few times.... yea - these were the best i found on the internet,, you'll be happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cocktail glasses
customer_reviews.text: While these are label nominally Margarita glasses, in reality they are just great cocktail glasses, period. It's a nice shape with just the right volume. They come in a nice box, with good cardboard separators, which we are using to store them in between parties. The weight of the glass is just right - not to light and not too heavy. A thumbs up from us.
customer_reviews.author: Camp RunamokTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: The glasses are beautiful but...
customer_reviews.text: I love the glasses, well the ones that weren't shattered upon arrival. The glasses were placed in a box with a card board separator then into another box 3x the size the ones the glasses are in. No bubble wrap, no stuff to keep the box from slamming against the sides oof the other during shipping. I give it 3 stars because I don't have the full set, thanks to the way the seller shipped it. Save your money and just go to Target and pick up a full set.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Did not Expect these to be that nice
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it, these are study and stylish and are great for parties where guests get constantly more drunk and clumsy. Watched someone knock over 4 full margarita glasses on the counter and not one broke... Bad party guest... awesome glasses.
customer_reviews.author: J. Costanzo

customer_reviews.title: Durable and budget friendly
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality at a bargain price. These glasses were well packaged and not a single one broke in shipment. They also survived an outdoor party without a chip or crack. Why bother buying those cheap plastic margarita glasses when you can pay a bit more for these quality ones!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really nice margarita glasses. classics.
customer_reviews.text: they are smaller, but like everybody says...fill them up more often with fresh margarita!! Having a dinner party tomorrow and plan to have them out at the margarita bar!! well worth the price. arrived packaged well and intact. fairly heavy duty glass. you will like these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffy

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: i received these glasses yesterday and i immediately called a friend for an impromptu margarita night. the glasses were just the right size and weight. They are sturdy without feeling heavy to hold. There's nothing fancy about them, but i like to use glass over plastic when i entertain small groups. the price is right so i won't freak out if something happens to them. I am looking forward to taking them out for weekend get-togethers. my favorite thing about this set is the storage box. i can keep them out of the way and not worry about losing them or having them break.
customer_reviews.author: Neptune227

customer_reviews.title: More for the money
customer_reviews.text: The Margarita glasses arrived in fine shape. All were in perfect condition. Twelve is more than I wanted, but there are plenty for spares.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stemware
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy and just the right size. I really love them.....12 are a bit too many for our needs, but there’s always that accident and then I have replacements.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Good price for quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a birthday present but two were broke inside the box. I didn't want to deal with the hastke of returning them and rising another package arriving damaged so I just gave my mom ten of them.
customer_reviews.author: DogMom2Boys

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are substantial and don't seem to break as easily as previous glasses we have had
customer_reviews.text: We put these in our vacation rental cabin. Needless to say, in a vacation rental - things get broken. These glasses are substantial and don't seem to break as easily as previous glasses we have had. Will purchase again as we need filler.
customer_reviews.author: Landy

customer_reviews.title: Not large enough- disappointed
customer_reviews.text: 9 oz is way too small- I wanted to return them but the return window closed. I’m stuck with these... disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Csotoneira

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are fine, if you need a bunch of margarita glasses ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the glasses were broken upon arrival. These glasses are fine, if you need a bunch of margarita glasses for cheap. Be aware that 9 oz is very small, I couldn't even fit the entire drink for the recipe I use into the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The price almost doubled from when we put them in the cart until the next day when we ordered. The glasses arrived and one of them has a wobbly base and isn't useable.
customer_reviews.author: Schrodinger

customer_reviews.title: Not plastic
customer_reviews.text: I mean these are very nice glasses but I literally searched plastic margarita glasses and these are glass so not really what I wanted but nice if your looking for glass ones
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with these - they were exactly what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Margarita glasses
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are exactly as described. They came boxed in a sturdy box to store them in. The price was perfect. They were not packed as carefully as could be though and I was surprised that none were broken! They just have thin pieces of cardboard separating them, and the glasses are not individually wrapped in any paper. The 9 oz. size is great, they are not obnoxious looking. They are not too dainty either, glass is a nice thickness. Would definitely recommend if Margarita glasses are what your looking for. The disposable ones are expensive and crack or the stems fall off. So for an extra few dollars it's worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dooggie73

customer_reviews.title: Many uses
customer_reviews.text: Everyone was very impressed with these glasses. Useful for Margaritas and Shrimp Cocktails also many more.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Casino

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special about these glasses. Discovered one was broken ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special about these glasses. Discovered one was broken upon opening carton. Decided to live with it as there wasn't time for replacement before planned party.
customer_reviews.author: A. B. Wann

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I was pricing plastic glasses for the same price, glad I went with these. People complain about the size, I thought they were perfect, nice heft and will be staple in the bar
customer_reviews.author: Jukebox Jim

customer_reviews.title: Nice Specialty Margarita Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great, especially for "Margarita-Focused" parties. We were throwing a 70th birthday party for a friend, and he had asked for Mexican Food. We thought that Margarita glasses would add a nice touch, and they did. These Libbey glasses are relatively inexpensive, and it won't be a big deal if one is broken.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Densford III

customer_reviews.title: Great Set at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived all intact, feels sturdy and looks great. Excellent price on Amazon at $19.99, and free fast shipping with Prime. The storage box is also handy. These are 9 oz glasses, so you might need to increase the amount of ingredients if making individual drinks. For pitchers of beverages, these work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: DeannaF

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for a party or whenever
customer_reviews.text: Nicer than I had thought they were going to be. Very nice for a party or whenever!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Breakage
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are non-commercial, by the way, so it's not wise to use a commercial hi-temp washer. I have ordered 3 cases of these glasses. 6 were shattered in the first box, 2 were shattered in the second. Luckily, none in the third. Packing is non-existent... just light cardboard separator that is much too big.
customer_reviews.author: Turtletraxx

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Claims to be 9 oz capacity. .this is incorrect. They hold 7 ozs.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Jaynes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with the quality of this set. I purchased them for parties as well as to use in my saltwater aquarium to hold some coral pieces. It looks great! Very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Pagano's

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got these glasses for a girls margarita party and they were just what a needed...
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

product_meta.title: Libbey Margarita Party Glasses, Set of 12 , Clear , 9 oz -
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingIt's time to put your college-age taco Tuesday parties to shame. This huge matching margarita set keeps everything flowing steady - from the Strawberry jalapeno margaritas, to the sweet and spicy conversation, to the memories that last a lifetime.
feature_bullets: Large matching set ideal for every slushie summer party you want to throw
Great gift for wedding registries, bachelorette parties, and housewarming parties
Durable and dishwasher safe for quick, easy cleanup; to help preserve your products, please refer to the Libbey website for care and handling instructions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars401 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
